exchangeLuckyballComment: Kun fanshi maki don Ƙwallon Sa'a.
inviteLuckyballComment: Kun karɓi Kwallon sa'a don gayyatar aboki.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: Kun fanshi maki don katin kyauta.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Kun yi amfani da Lucky Ball don shigar da Lucky Draw.
winLotteryPointComment: An ba ku maki don cin nasarar Lotto.
partnerMailTitle: Jagorar Aikace-aikacen Abokin Hulɗa na BUFLEXZ
partnerMailContents1: Da fatan za a bincika takaddun da ake buƙata don amincewar abokin tarayya kuma aika amsa tare da fayil ɗin da aka haɗe!
partnerMailContents3:
Da fatan za a haɗa kwafin katin shaidar ku ko fasfo
don tabbatar da asalin abokin tarayya.
partnerMailContents5:
Da fatan za a duba takaddun da bayanin da ake buƙata
don amincewar abokin tarayya kuma ku aiko mana da amsa!
partnerMailContents6: (Nau'in ciniki, lambar tuƙi, lambar asusu, sunan farko mai riƙe da asusu, sunan tsakiya, sunan ƙarshe, lambar wayar hannu mai karɓa, da sauransu.)
partnerMailContents8:
Da fatan za a aiko mana da lambar waya inda za a iya samun ku
don sadarwa tare da abokin tarayya.
partnerMailContents9:
Da fatan za a aika da amsa ta imel zuwa partner@buflexz.com .
Bayan ƙungiyar aiki ta bincika amsa, za a aiwatar da tantancewar abokin tarayya da amincewa.
authMailContents1: Za mu aiko muku da lambar tantancewar imel.
authMailContents3: An fitar da maɓallin tantancewa don amincin imel.
authMailContents4:
Da fatan za a shigar da lambar tantancewa mai lamba 6 kai tsaye a cikin amincin
taga a cikin app ko kwafi kuma liƙa lambar tantancewa.
authMailContents5:
Wannan imel ɗin don aikawa ne kawai.
Ba za a iya ba da amsa ba, don haka idan kuna da tambayoyi ko rashin jin daɗi,
da fatan za a tuntuɓe mu ta cibiyar abokin ciniki a cikin app ɗin BUFLEXZ.
